data.introduce: 接收用户请求，根据条件进行商旅优选规则查询查询。
data.functions:
1、如果指定了productName参数，则根据商旅优选规则查询产品名称进行模糊查询；
2、如果指定了airlinecode参数，则根据商旅优选规则查询产品适用航司进行模糊查询；
3、如果指定了fareBasisList，则模糊查询该运价基础对应的产品；
4、如果指定了CABINCODE，则查询该舱位对应的产品；可输入多个舱位代码
5、如果指定了LISTLABEL，则模糊查询并展示该服务对应的产品；
6、不传参则默认查询所有产品信息。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"data","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求参数集合","children":[{"name":"office","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"查询Office","children":[]},{"name":"airlineCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航司两字码：支持精确查询","children":[]},{"name":"fareBasis","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"产品运价基础：支持模糊查询","children":[]},{"name":"listLabel","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"服务名称","children":[]},{"name":"cabinCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"舱位","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"result","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"返回集合","children":[{"name":"airlineCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航司两字码","children":[]},{"name":"byPassenger","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否按乘客拼入扩展指令","children":[]},{"name":"cabinCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位：多个舱位通过','分割","children":[]},{"name":"cabinLabel","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位标签","children":[]},{"name":"detailsPage","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"详细描述","children":[]},{"name":"endDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班有效期截至时间：格式：YYYYMMDD","children":[]},{"name":"farebassis","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"产品运价基础列表：多个farebassis通过','分割","children":[]},{"name":"id","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编号","children":[]},{"name":"listLabel","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"列表标签","children":[]},{"name":"office","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"office号：多个office通过','分割","children":[]},{"name":"productName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"产品名称","children":[]},{"name":"startDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班有效期起始时间：格式：YYYYMMDD","children":[]},{"name":"legalRight","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"法律权利","children":[]},{"name":"agentId","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"代理人ID标识","children":[]},{"name":"expandCmd","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"扩展指令","children":[]},{"name":"salesIncome","type":"float","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"额外提供产品代理费","children":[]},{"name":"salesIncomeInvisibleOffice","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"额外提供产品代理费不可见office","children":[]},{"name":"isInternational","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否为国际","children":[]},{"name":"departureAirport","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"始发地机场","children":[]},{"name":"excludeDepartureAirport","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"排除始发地机场","children":[]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office prermission denied ","msgZh":" 没有office权限 "},{"code":" -400 ","name":null,"msg":" format of xml string is not valid ","msgZh":" xml内容格式错误 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" input error ","msgZh":" 输入错误 "},{"code":" -500 ","name":null,"msg":" office code is empty ","msgZh":" office代码为空 "},{"code":" -700 ","name":null,"msg":" office code is not valid ","msgZh":" office号格式错误 "},{"code":" -83401 ","name":null,"msg":" error refund background ","msgZh":" 后台返回错误 "}]
